Eberhart & Russel’s Model ANOVA

Source: R/er_anova.R
er_anova.Rd

ANOVA of Eberhart & Russel’s Model

Usage

er_anova(.data, .y, .rep, .gen, .env)

# Default S3 method
er_anova(.data, .y, .rep, .gen, .env)

Arguments

.data

data.frame

.y

Response Variable

.rep

Replication Factor

.gen

Genotypes Factor

.env

Environment Factor

Value

Additive ANOVA

References

Singh, R. K. and Chaudhary, B. D. (2004) Biometrical Methods in Quantitative Genetic Analysis. New Delhi: Kalyani.

Author

  1. Muhammad Yaseen (myaseen208@gmail.com)

  2. Kent M. Edkridge (keskridge1@unl.edu)

Examples


data(ge_data)
Yield.er_anova <-
         er_anova(
            .data = ge_data
          , .y    = Yield
          , .rep  = Rep
          , .gen  = Gen
          , .env  = Env
          )
Yield.er_anova
